issue.title: www.twitch.tv

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.diff_hunk:
@@ -4888,6 +4888,8 @@
 ! note that we don't use || prefixes because mail tracking pixels are often proxied by mail providers
 ! it's problematic that due to how Gmail proxy work, these domains aren't even exposed on the network level
 ! fortunately, extensions can see them (Gmail puts the real URL in the location.hash part of the src)
+! Shutterstock
+shutterstockmail.com/pub/as?_ri_=$image

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.diff_hunk:
@@ -7,6 +7,12 @@
 ! Good: @@/adblocker/detect.js$domain=example.org
 ! Bad: ||ad.doubleclick.net^ (should be in adservers.txt)
 !
+!
+! https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/134176
+||pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js$redirect=googlesyndication-adsbygoogle,domain=canalhelptutoryt.blogspot.com
+!#if (adguard_app_ios || adguard_ext_android_cb || adguard_ext_safari)
+@@||pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js$domain=canalhelptutoryt.blogspot.com
+!#endif
comment.body:
Use these rules without hints or directive next time.
Note, you should specify the type of the request for the redirect rule.
```
||pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js$script,redirect=googlesyndication-adsbygoogle,domain=example.com,important
@@||pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js$domain=example.com
```
Btw, your rules does not work on my end. Try something different like this, for instance
```
canalhelptutoryt.blogspot.com###antiAdBlock
```

comment.body:
> Установлена полная лицензионная версия Adguard и она пропускает аудиорекламу в web-версии spotify. Вопросов бы не возникло, но по какой-то причине рекламы нет, если установлено обычное расширение для хрома AdGuard Антибаннер без полной версии приложения. С ним аудиорекалымы нет.

Может фильтрация программой не работает? Нажмите на замок в адресной строке браузера и покажите скриншот подробностей сертификата https.

labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

> Note, you should specify the type of the request for the redirect rule.

Okay.

> Btw, your rules does not work on my end. Try something different like this, for instance

In fact, I tested with AdGuard Base filter[^1], AdGuard Chinese and AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter[^2].
[^1]: The anti-adblock script on the website detects the filter on my end. In other words, only AG Spanish + AG Chinese are not detected.
[^2]: I enabled the filter because the document is written in Portuguese language.

comment.body:
@HeinerTheBest Hi. We blocked ads yesterday. It seems their subtitles are with hardcoded pauses for ads.
Please check separately(1 or/and 2):
* add to user filter 
`hulu.com#%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "Object.prototype._parseVAST", "noopFunc")`
`hulu.com#%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "Object.prototype.createAdBlocker", "noopFunc")`
* add unblocking rule for recently added rule
`hulu.com#@%#//scriptlet('json-prune', 'breaks pause_ads')`

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

4.1.39

Desktop

https://www.nestlenutrition-institute.org/

_No response_

issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
